alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 10:32PM CDT until July 25 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Stearns County in central Minnesota... Northern Kandiyohi County in central Minnesota... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1031 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Brooten, or 26 miles northwest of Willmar, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management reported large branches down, and the Morris Airport measured 60 mph winds. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brooten around 1045 PM CDT. Belgrade around 1050 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
